Sentencas: Material interactions at elevated temperatures are major contributors to long-term degradation in solid oxide cells (SOC).
Titulo: Effects of impurities on silver-(ZrO2)0.92(Y2O3)0.08 interface morphology in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The use of silver in SOC electrodes is promising due to its good catalytic activity at reduced operating temperatures and chemical stability with other SOC materials.
Titulo: Effects of impurities on silver-(ZrO2)0.92(Y2O3)0.08 interface morphology in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: However, no significant studies have been conducted on the interfaces between silver-based electrodes and common SOC electrolyte materials such as yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ).
Titulo: Effects of impurities on silver-(ZrO2)0.92(Y2O3)0.08 interface morphology in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: A symmetric cell configuration with applied voltage bias has been used to investigate interfaces between silver-based electrodes and YSZ electrolytes at 750 degrees C. Surface porosity and undulations, as well as trace impurities were observed on the YSZ surfaces using electron microscopy and energy dispersive X-ray spectroscopy.
Titulo: Effects of impurities on silver-(ZrO2)0.92(Y2O3)0.08 interface morphology in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The applied voltage bias enhances the migration of impurities from the electrodes to the silver YSZ interfaces.
Titulo: Effects of impurities on silver-(ZrO2)0.92(Y2O3)0.08 interface morphology in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The impurities affect the YSZ surface energy characteristics, leading to YSZ surface diffusion and undulation formation.
Titulo: Effects of impurities on silver-(ZrO2)0.92(Y2O3)0.08 interface morphology in solid oxide cells
